languages.text: Это оружие наносит +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно за каждого врага на соседних клетках с персонажем. Враги, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, не могут совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.
languages.original_text: This weapon deals +2 additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wielder. Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Это оружие наносит +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно за каждого врага на соседних клетках с персонажем. Враги, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, не могут совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

Враги, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, не могут совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

languages.text: This weapon deals 2 additional damage for every enemy adjacent to the wielder and enemies hit with this weapon lose their ability to perform attacks of opportunity for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: This weapon deals 2 additional damage for every enemy adjacent to the wielder and enemies hit with this weapon lose their ability to perform attacks of opportunity for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: This weapon deals +2 more damage for each enemy adjacent to the wielder. Enemies hit by this weapon cannot make attacks of opportunity for 1 round.

This weapon deals +2 additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wielder. Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

This weapon deals +2 additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wielder. Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Diese Waffe verursacht +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} für jeden Gegner auf einem an den Träger angrenzenden Feld. Von dieser Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Gegner können 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} ausführen.

Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Waffe verursacht +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} für jeden Gegner auf einem an den Träger angrenzenden Feld. Von dieser Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Gegner können 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} ausführen.

languages.text: Cette arme inflige 2 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires par ennemi adjacent à son porteur. Les adversaires {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchés{/g} par cette arme ne peuvent pas porter d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: This weapon deals +2 additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wielder. Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette arme inflige 2 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires par ennemi adjacent à son porteur. Les adversaires {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchés{/g} par cette arme ne peuvent pas porter d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: この武器は使い手の周りにいる敵にそれぞれ+2の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。この武器に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃された{/g}敵は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を行うことができない。
languages.original_text: This weapon deals +2 additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wielder. Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この武器は使い手の周りにいる敵にそれぞれ+2の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。この武器に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃された{/g}敵は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を行うことができない。

languages.text: Bu silah, kullanan kişinin bitişiğindeki her düşman için +2 ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Silahın {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğu{/g} düşmanlar, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısı{/g} yapamaz.
languages.original_text: This weapon deals +2 additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wielder. Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bu silah, kullanan kişinin bitişiğindeki her düşman için +2 ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Silahın {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğu{/g} düşmanlar, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısı{/g} yapamaz.

languages.text: Esta arma inflige +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional por cada enemigo adyacente al portador. Los enemigos que sufren un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} de esta arma no pueden lanzar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: This weapon deals +2 additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wielder. Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta arma inflige +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional por cada enemigo adyacente al portador. Los enemigos que sufren un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} de esta arma no pueden lanzar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: 装备者身边每有一名敌人，这件武器就额外造成+2{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。被这把武器{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的敌人一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内无法进行{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: This weapon deals +2 additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wielder. Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 装备者身边每有一名敌人，这件武器就额外造成+2{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。被这把武器{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的敌人一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内无法进行{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
